author: luisfe
body:
(https://images.ecency.com/DQmNrpw68ub7x4HnFyvhUjgiro5GUvougtcKdt2ZftidzMs/facebook_creation_19604725.jpg


**(Esta es una publicaci√≥n biling√ºe, puedes ver la versi√≥n en castellano al final del post)**
Christmas ended and the pieces of the manger were returned to their boxes, as well as the multicolored light bulbs and the Christmas tree with its decorations. But this naughty little sheep escaped - it says that it wants to see the carnival -. Well, while they discover it - I'm sure they will - and return it to its box, I take the opportunity to photograph the shadows of its walking legs.
lf you want to participate in this contest organized by @melinda010100, find out its rules by clicking [here](https://ecency.com/hive-179017/@melinda010100/shadow-hunters-smash-contest-round-df0a3ab63f5af)
**Versi√≥n en castellano**
(https://images.ecency.com/DQmNrpw68ub7x4HnFyvhUjgiro5GUvougtcKdt2ZftidzMs/facebook_creation_19604725.jpg


Termin√≥ la Navidad y las piezas del pesebre fueron devueltas a sus cajas, tambi√©n los bombillitos multicolores y el √°rbol de Navidad con sus adornos. Pero esta ovejita traviesa se escap√≥ - dice que quiere conocer el carnaval -. Bueno, mientras la descubren - seguro que lo har√°n - y la devuelven a su caja aprovecho para fografiar las sombras de sus patitas andariegas
.Si deseas participar en este concurso convocado por @melinda010100 ent√©rate de sus bases haciendo clic [ac√°]( https://ecency.com/hive-179017/@melinda010100/shadow-hunters-smash-contest-round-df0a3ab63f5af )
https://images.ecency.com/DQmNzvnj5TgHHWa6kwAR76CGA5QvhDHKrBtWGUAHedBg3BE/separador_luisfe.png
###### Muchas gracias por visitar mi blog y leer mi post. Espero que esta sea una semana llena de cosas buenas para ti y tu familia. Dios te bendiga.
> ###### Thank you very much for visiting my blog and reading my post. I hope this be a week full of good things for you and your family. God bless you, *** "Follow @advertisingbot2, an account that gives you mini-jobs and campaigns" "Sigue @advertisingbot2, una cuenta que te da microtareas y campa√±as" ###
Your visit to my blog is very important to me, I hope you liked my photography work and leave with the intention of returning..

author: sayury
root_title: My Pic To Shadow Hunters /SMASh Contest-Round 304
body:
https://images.ecency.com/DQmNWK1trvdKuJm6z5ehWgyWPYpbzjCx5woxPKTNfVZG3N1/20231203_155924.jpg


**(Esta es una publicaci√≥n biling√ºe, puedes ver la versi√≥n en castellano al final del post)**
Hello, dear Shadowhunter community. Today I bring the shadow of a foliage. I really like shadows whose origin is plant-based since they have a very particular beauty. I hope you like this one specifically.
If you have not yet participated in this contest organized by @melinda010100, I invite you to do so. You will discover the beauty hidden in the shadows that did not catch your attention before.
You can read the contest rules by clicking [here]( https://ecency.com/hive-179017/@melinda010100/show-me-a-shadow-smash-d2114d8c79548 )
**Versi√≥n en castellano**
https://images.ecency.com/DQmNWK1trvdKuJm6z5ehWgyWPYpbzjCx5woxPKTNfVZG3N1/20231203_155924.jpg

Hola, estimada comunidad de cazadores de sombras. Hoy traigo la sombra de un follaje. Me gustan mucho las sombras cuyo origen es vegetal ya que poseen una belleza muy particular. Espero que esta espec√≠ficamente les agrade.
Si a√∫n no has participado en este concurso convocado por @melinda010100, te invito a que lo hagas. Descubrir√°s la belleza oculta en las sombras que antes no llamaban tu atenci√≥n.
Puedes leer las bases del concurso clicando [ac√°]( https://ecency.com/hive-179017/@melinda010100/show-me-a-shadow-smash-d2114d8c79548 )

author: cashheaven
root_title: Battle Mage Secrets: Going back to basics with Possibilus
body:
![BATTLE MAGE SECRETS Back to Basics](https://images.hive.blog/0x0/https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/splinterlands/23wWkMfvbCLnoKSyogCyJNdVzjgR6aM255BF42UQEHZacT4rpnbsz8FAE1PZvoYiSbNm8.png) This week, I'm sharing my game in Back To Basics ruleset using Possibilus the Wise. ![Back to Basics weekly challenge](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/cashheaven/23wN1pSKXi38eFt4hLqcjoRS469Q2R9nZW1kKuEK9eVRHWi7xMWC2fvWCKnc9fgQGqwhm.png) You can check out this [BATTLE MAGE SECRETS Weekly Challenge link](https://peakd.com/hive-13323/@splinterlands/battle-mage-secrets-weekly-challenge-s71z5n) if you also want to participate. ---
**Ruleset:** *Back to Basics* *Holy Protection* *Up Close & Personal* **Mana Cap:** *54* **Elements:** *All except Dragon*
![Game Modifications](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/cashheaven/23uQfkrP711hfhogRwexeprRr7wtvqAin6ahY3559FYBn5kPYynkxPRVr1nf7Td2PC9BS.png)
This is a [Back To Basics](https://splintercards.com/rulesets.php?rs=3) ruleset game so Monsters lose all abilities. Back row monsters are safe from enemy's Sneak, Snipe and Opportunity attacks. The ruleset places importance on Magic and Ranged attacks as melee attacks loose their ability to hit outside of the first position.
![Back To Basics](https://splintercards.com/media/ruleset/back-to-basics.png)
This is a [Holy Protection](https://splintercards.com/rulesets.php?rs=14) ruleset game so All Monsters have the Divine Shield ability. Monsters that normally have this ability do not get it twice. The trick to win in this ruleset is to fill all 6 slots of your line up and use monsters with Blast and Double Strike.
![Holy Protection](https://splintercards.com/media/ruleset/holy-protection.png)
This is an [Up Close & Personal](https://splintercards.com/rulesets.php?rs=32) ruleset game so Only Monsters with Melee attack may be used in battles. Choose a summoner that increases/reduces Melee attack or Mylor. Keep a monster with Shield, Retaliate or Thorns in the first position. Reach, Sneak, Opportunity help in this ruleset.
![Up Close & Personal](https://splintercards.com/media/ruleset/up-close-&-personal.png)
--- ![Let the battle begin!](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/cashheaven/23tvD6LMRqy7X7bG5zt6g4YCMGaNBipr7By1AFGYUhNeowEn7gRFmRrDSyEjR1gptEdDK.png) You may also [watch battle here](https://splinterlands.com/?p=battle&id=sl_340b92e0173430a7f95180e247935f3d). ---
Summoner: **Possibilus the Wise** Abilities: All friendly monsters gain +2 health All friendly monsters gain [Trample](https://splintercards.com/abilities.php?ab=58) ability All friendly monsters gain [Reach](https://splintercards.com/abilities.php?ab=10) ability
![Possibilus the Wise](https://d36mxiodymuqjm.cloudfront.net/cards_by_level/chaos/Possibilus%20the%20Wise_lv4.png) ---
Pos 1 Monster: **Gargoya Lion** Abilities: This is **Back to Basics** so Monster abilities will be removed at the start of the game.
![Gargoya Lion](https://d36mxiodymuqjm.cloudfront.net/cards_by_level/reward/Gargoya%20Lion_lv10.png) ---
Pos 2 Monster: **Flying Squid** Abilities: This is **Back to Basics** so Monster abilities will be removed at the start of the game.
![Flying Squid](https://d36mxiodymuqjm.cloudfront.net/cards_by_level/chaos/Flying%20Squid_lv10.png) ---
Pos 3 Monster: **Cruel Sethropod** Abilities: This is **Back to Basics** so Monster abilities will be removed at the start of the game.
![Cruel Sethropod](https://d36mxiodymuqjm.cloudfront.net/cards_by_level/chaos/Cruel%20Sethropod_lv10.png) ---
Pos 4 Monster: **Diemonshark** Abilities: This is **Back to Basics** so Monster abilities will be removed at the start of the game.
![Diemonshark](https://d36mxiodymuqjm.cloudfront.net/cards_by_level/chaos/Diemonshark_lv8.png) ---
Pos 5 Monster: **Coastal Sentry** Abilities: This is **Back to Basics** so Monster abilities will be removed at the start of the game.
![Coastal Sentry](https://d36mxiodymuqjm.cloudfront.net/cards_by_level/soulbound/Coastal%20Sentry_lv6.png) ---
Pos 6 Monster: **Deeplurker** Abilities: This is **Back to Basics** so Monster abilities will be removed at the start of the game.
![Deeplurker](https://d36mxiodymuqjm.cloudfront.net/cards_by_level/chaos/Deeplurker_lv10.png) --- Now that Rebellion edition is here, do you think there's a stronger line up in this Game Modification? Comment down below. You may also [watch battle here](https://splinterlands.com/?p=battle&id=sl_340b92e0173430a7f95180e247935f3d). --- Hope you learned something from my game and how I came up with this lineup. What would you have done differently given the same ruleset, mana cap and active elements? Let us know by dropping a comment. --- Want to play Splinterlands with me? [Play with me](https://splinterlands.com?ref=cashheaven) Make passive income by renting out your card collection in [peakmonsters](peakmonsters.com) Earn on your blogs. Blog with us here in [Hive](https://peakd.com/register?ref=cashheaven) Earn passive income by sharing your internet bandwidth with [Honeygain](https://r.honeygain.me/JONAS2EC92) If you are looking for a charity to donate to, please consider [Food for Hungry Minds](https://foodforhungryminds.org/donate/). ###### Card images are owned and open-sourced by Splinterlands.io Follow @advertisingbot2, an account that gives you mini-jobs and campaigns

author: advertisingbot2
root_title: Hive Marketing Campaign 24011201 Week 2 For Advertisingbot2
body:
Hello everyone who wants to earn some small money,

here I announce the next advertising contest for week 2 from sponsor @achimmertens, period: 2024-01-12 to 2024-01-20.

![Earn Money(2).png](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/achimmertens/AKAr2pK3Nw7DhpREEcx2yQ1dSe3BQ4KKDFLKAWjNL9Ni952afaaKuqX68gTapsB.png)

---

![grafik.png](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/advertisingbot2/23zbKpafXUuXqcgN1UqE4ELLLjBk6HWR7VCHXMBWeuuhHvjVr9V26Vu632H51AX3QEB1Q.png)

## Advertising Text:
**"Follow @advertisingbot2, an account that gives you mini-jobs and campaigns"**

![grafik.png](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/advertisingbot2/EpnDF7XjUzRvHbukYSaPzgLofEeP2bKekjBmuA9oo8mHW8BAv1i1sGfdg5fHShUuuSn.png)

@advertisingbot2 is an account, that was made for creating automated post. It creates reports for some token statistics, but also adverising campaigns. It checks the results and the work of the members and pays them their reward. It is an account from @achimmertens. 


# The Reward

The first 10 Hive users, that do this, will get 2.000 Hive each short after the end of the campaign.


# Does it work?
Yes. We did it before. Here is the proof:

* https://peakd.com/advertising/@advertisingbot2/winners-of-the-hive-marketing-campaign-23120401 
* https://peakd.com/hive-154303/@advertisingbot2/winners-of-marketing-campaing-23111001
* https://peakd.com/hive-154303/@advertisingbot2/winners-of-the-advertising-contest-from-last-week
* https://peakd.com/hive-154303/@advertisingbot2/winners-of-the-hive-marketing-campaign-23121801-week-51-for-beer-community

![grafik.png](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/advertisingbot2/23vrtfBe9soddee9UwH688PMyJYa2GjTPDpiV9s9mAwMHwp7AWurWJanpDDMtpQJx9z89.png)

![grafik.png](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/achimmertens/23wghGTaUFS6SsidPJ6d5QqyM3cxpzSj2PMQ8r2XZSWHeBAi2jC4e7JdmyTWL8DbtYTpc.png)

# Inviting Former Members
Hi @barbyjr, @luisfe, @azabache2021, @sayury, @lunafrances, @elioe, @orlandobello, @detlev, @oasiskp2, @advertisingbot, @achimmertens,
what do you think? Do you want to join the campaign again?

# Status of this project

Last week I managed to work good on the automation of my advertising process. At the moment I still have some manual work, but it gets less. I have build in some new features, like a list of the members of the last campaigns, which help me to stay in contact for new offers. So, stay tuned, I have not finished yet, the work goes on ;-)

---

![Questions.png](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/achimmertens/AKKRqJt1qnuNodPEACGiuC9iauEfvSWwo3w9ACbwELDzPg5VpvwJCsfsA8ptwYH.png)

*[origin of some images](https://photofunia.com/)*
